Strings.Text: There is no need to operate it \nanymore.{pause}
With the shield shutter activated, \nyou cannot go in.{pause}
All the computers are covered \nwith dust.{pause}
All the computers are covered \nwith dust.{pause}
\nThis one has power.{pause}{clear}Will you operate it?{0x3000}
There is no need to operate it \nanymore.{pause}
There is something behind the \nmonitor.{pause}{clear}You have found a new DINO FILE.{pause}
